summary: Provides a collection of utility functions that construct a variety of synthetic graph structures—including simple graphs, bipartite graphs, cliques, block graphs, heterogeneous graphs, and batched graph collections—using DGL, NetworkX, NumPy, and SciPy, for use in unit tests.
business_intent: Facilitate reliable testing of graph‑related code by supplying reproducible, configurable graph instances that cover diverse topologies and data formats.
